Fresh faces are a sight for sore eyes. I feared help would never come.

See over there? That's Nimistrix. Her gluttony has devastated Savage Reach.

I can't stop her, but I can aid you.

Break these pylons to summon reinforcements.

I'm afraid you can only use two crystals. Help will appear.

If you defeat her without help, so much the better.

Nature needs you to restore the balance."I won't fail."
